title: Beyond climate change: Examining the role of environmental justice, agricultural mechanization, and social expenditures in alleviating rural poverty
content:
Publication date: December 2023

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 6

Author(s): Muhammad Khalid Anser, Sheikh Usman Yousaf, Bushra Usman, Kamran Azam, Nur Fatihah Abdullah Bandar, Hanifah Jambari, Sriyanto Sriyanto, Khalid Zaman
